content.rendered:
[et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.16″ global_colors_info=”{}” theme_builder_area=”post_content”][et_pb_row disabled_on=”on|on|on” _builder_version=”4.16″ disabled=”on” global_colors_info=”{}” theme_builder_area=”post_content”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.16″ global_colors_info=”{}” theme_builder_area=”post_content”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.16″ link_option_url=”https://register.influencermarketingawards.com/2020-ceremony-registration” global_colors_info=”{}” theme_builder_area=”post_content”]

How do I Watch the Virtual Ceremony?

The ceremony will start at 16:00 BST on Wednesday, 19 August 2020.

Registering is free, quick and easy. All you need to do is register online and you will be emailed a joining link one hour before the start. That’s it!

The ceremony will be streamed LIVE and not available to watch again after, so make sure you’re registered to see who walks away with Bronze, Silver and Gold this year.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.16″ global_colors_info=”{}” theme_builder_area=”post_content”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.16″ global_colors_info=”{}” theme_builder_area=”post_content”][et_pb_divider _builder_version=”4.16″ custom_margin=”||0px||false|false” custom_padding=”0px||0px|||” global_colors_info=”{}” theme_builder_area=”post_content”][/et_pb_divider][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.19.4″ min_height=”333px” global_colors_info=”{}” theme_builder_area=”post_content”]

Who can enter?

We welcome entries from across the globe.  And they are open to anyone in the creator economy who can demonstrate that they add value to brands or the ecosystem itself. This includes agencies, brands, influencers, content creators, platforms, technology companies etc.  

Entries may be made directly by the company or via an authorised agent such as their agency, technology partner or PR agency. 

Entries may also be made in conjunction with their partners. For example an agency with a brand or a brand with a technology company. We find this is a popular and often successful option.

If you feel an entry could be suited to more than one category, it may be submitted for multiple categories – there will be a charge for each entry submitted.

Full guidance, including deadlines and entry tips can be found in our entry kit. 

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.16″ global_colors_info=”{}” theme_builder_area=”post_content”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.16″ global_colors_info=”{}” theme_builder_area=”post_content”][et_pb_divider _builder_version=”4.16″ custom_margin=”||0px||false|false” custom_padding=”0px|||||” global_colors_info=”{}” theme_builder_area=”post_content”][/et_pb_divider][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.19.4″ global_colors_info=”{}” theme_builder_area=”post_content”]

What is eligibility period for entries?

The work must have been carried out between 1st April 2022 and the Last Chance Deadline, 25th April 2023.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.16″ global_colors_info=”{}” theme_builder_area=”post_content”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.16″ global_colors_info=”{}” theme_builder_area=”post_content”][et_pb_divider _builder_version=”4.16″ custom_margin=”||0px||false|false” custom_padding=”0px|||||” global_colors_info=”{}” theme_builder_area=”post_content”][/et_pb_divider][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.20.0″ global_colors_info=”{}” theme_builder_area=”post_content”]

When do entries close?

Entry submissions will be open until midnight (in your timezone) on the 28th April 2023.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.16″ global_colors_info=”{}” theme_builder_area=”post_content”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.16″ global_colors_info=”{}” theme_builder_area=”post_content”][et_pb_divider _builder_version=”4.16″ custom_margin=”||0px||false|false” custom_padding=”0px|||||” global_colors_info=”{}” theme_builder_area=”post_content”][/et_pb_divider][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.19.4″ global_colors_info=”{}” theme_builder_area=”post_content”]

Can I be invoiced for my entries?

If you’re entering five or more categories and would like to be invoiced, please email awards@hellopartner.com.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.16″ global_colors_info=”{}” theme_builder_area=”post_content”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.16″ global_colors_info=”{}” theme_builder_area=”post_content”][et_pb_divider _builder_version=”4.16″ custom_margin=”||0px||false|false” global_colors_info=”{}” theme_builder_area=”post_content”][/et_pb_divider][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.16″ global_colors_info=”{}” theme_builder_area=”post_content”]

Can I withdraw an entry?

An entry may be withdrawn for any reason up until the shortlist is announced upon written request; however the entry fee is non-refundable.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.16″ global_colors_info=”{}” theme_builder_area=”post_content”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.16″ global_colors_info=”{}” theme_builder_area=”post_content”][et_pb_divider _builder_version=”4.16″ custom_margin=”||0px||false|false” global_colors_info=”{}” theme_builder_area=”post_content”][/et_pb_divider][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.19.4″ custom_padding=”||0px|||” global_colors_info=”{}” theme_builder_area=”post_content”]

Where can I view the category criteria?

You will be able to view individual guidance for writing the entry for each category via our online platform.

This year thanks to your feedback we have also made this available to download as a Google Drive spreadsheet.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.16″ global_colors_info=”{}” theme_builder_area=”post_content”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.16″ global_colors_info=”{}” theme_builder_area=”post_content”][et_pb_divider _builder_version=”4.16″ min_height=”24px” custom_margin=”||0px||false|false” global_colors_info=”{}” theme_builder_area=”post_content”][/et_pb_divider][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.19.4″ min_height=”312px” global_colors_info=”{}” theme_builder_area=”post_content”]

How much do entries cost?

We operate a tiered pricing system;

Earlybird £295

Regular £395

Last Chance £495

Rising Star and Content Creator of the Year Awards 

Earlybird £195 

Regular £295

Last Chance £395

All prices exclude VAT at 20%

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row disabled_on=”off|off|off” _builder_version=”4.16″ global_colors_info=”{}” theme_builder_area=”post_content”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.16″ global_colors_info=”{}” theme_builder_area=”post_content”][et_pb_divider _builder_version=”4.16″ custom_margin=”||0px||false|false” global_colors_info=”{}” theme_builder_area=”post_content”][/et_pb_divider][et_pb_text disabled_on=”off|off|off” _builder_version=”4.16″ global_colors_info=”{}” theme_builder_area=”post_content”]

How can I become a sponsor?

Please download our sponsorship kit which provides detailed information about the opportunities available this year.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row disabled_on=”on|on|on” _builder_version=”4.16″ disabled=”on” global_colors_info=”{}” theme_builder_area=”post_content”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.16″ global_colors_info=”{}” theme_builder_area=”post_content”][et_pb_divider _builder_version=”4.16″ custom_margin=”||0px||false|false” global_colors_info=”{}” theme_builder_area=”post_content”][/et_pb_divider][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.16″ global_colors_info=”{}” theme_builder_area=”post_content”]

Are There Other Sponsorship Opportunities Available?

There are plenty more sponsorship opportunities available from welcome drinks sponsor, after-party sponsor and photo booth sponsorship.

For more information, contact sales@performancein.com.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.16″ global_colors_info=”{}” theme_builder_area=”post_content”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.16″ global_colors_info=”{}” theme_builder_area=”post_content”][et_pb_divider _builder_version=”4.16″ custom_margin=”||0px||false|false” global_colors_info=”{}” theme_builder_area=”post_content”][/et_pb_divider][et_pb_text admin_label=”Text” _builder_version=”4.7.7″ background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” width_tablet=”” width_phone=”” width_last_edited=”on|tablet” global_module=”476″ saved_tabs=”all” global_colors_info=”{}” theme_builder_area=”post_content”]

Please read our terms and conditions in full before submitting entries or making payments online.

By agreeing to these Terms and Conditions you are bound by and agree to the relevant Terms and Conditions of Existem Events Ltd (PerformanceIN/Hello Partner), the organiser of the Global Influencer Marketing Awards.

REFUNDS

Once an entry has been submitted it may be withdrawn as per the terms above, however, all entry fees paid are non-refundable.

For table sales or sponsorship please review your contract or contact us.

COMPANY NAME & LOGO

When submitting your entry you are also giving permission to PerformanceIN to use your company name and logo in marketing material.

Written notice must be given via awards@hellopartner.com if you do not consent to Hello Partner using your company name or logo.

INTELLECTUAL PROPERTY DECLARATION

By submitting your entry you confirm you are the owner of all intellectual rights in your entry or have all necessary consents from all other owner (s) of intellectual rights.

PRIVACY POLICY

By submitting your entry you acknowledge you have read and agreed to our privacy policy.

Our brands and partners would like to stay in touch to let you know about events, information and opportunities, which we hope will help you in your work.  We believe we can demonstrate a legitimate interest in using your details for these messages, but if you do not wish to receive these messages, please email us to opt-out via hello@performancein.com

WINNER COLLATERAL

Please be aware that we can deliver certificates and trophies to one address only. If you do not supply an address to the Event Manager when requested after the ceremony, these will be delivered to the address given at the point of entry.

PAYMENT

Invoices for the Awards should be paid online with a debit or credit card. If preferred, payment can be made via invoice and BACS and you are able to select this option via the portal. Amex is subject to an admin fee of 2.4%. If payment is not made prior to the judging day your entry will be excluded and disqualified.

WITHDRAWING AN ENTRY

You may withdraw an entry up to 2 weeks prior to the ceremony. Any entry fees paid are non-refundable.

CHANGES

The organiser reserves the right to make changes to deadlines, pricing, and entry criteria without prior notice.

 

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section]
